profiles.name: aws-cis-benchmark
profiles.title: CIS AWS Foundations Benchmark
profiles.summary: This profile implements the CIS AWS Foundations Benchmark v1.5.0

controls.title: Ensure no 'root' user account access key exists
controls.desc: The root user is the most privileged user in an AWS account. AWS Access Keys provide programmatic access to AWS.

results.code_desc: AWS IAM Root User should not have access key

controls.title: Ensure MFA is enabled for the 'root' user account
controls.desc: The root user is the most privileged user in an AWS account. MFA adds an extra layer of protection.

results.code_desc: AWS IAM Root User should have MFA enabled

controls.title: Ensure S3 buckets are configured with 'Block public access'
controls.desc: Amazon S3 'Block Public Access' provides settings to help manage public access to S3 resources.

results.code_desc: S3 Bucket production-app-data should have block public access enabled
results.message:
expected block_public_acls to be true, got false
expected block_public_policy to be true, got false

controls.title: Ensure S3 buckets are configured with 'Block public access'
controls.desc: Amazon S3 'Block Public Access' provides settings to help manage public access to S3 resources.

results.code_desc: S3 Bucket compliant-logs-bucket should have block public access enabled

controls.title: Ensure S3 buckets have server-side encryption enabled
controls.desc: Amazon S3 default encryption provides a way to set the default encryption behavior for an S3 bucket.

results.code_desc: S3 Bucket legacy-uploads should have encryption enabled
results.message: expected encryption to be configured, got nil

controls.title: Ensure CloudTrail is enabled in all regions
controls.desc: AWS CloudTrail is a web service that records AWS API calls for your account.

results.code_desc: CloudTrail should be enabled in all regions

controls.title: Ensure no security groups allow ingress from 0.0.0.0/0 to port 22
controls.desc: Security groups provide stateful filtering of ingress/egress network traffic.

results.code_desc: Security group sg-0abc123def456 should not allow SSH from 0.0.0.0/0
results.message: found ingress rule allowing SSH (port 22) from 0.0.0.0/0

controls.title: Ensure MFA is enabled for all IAM users with console password
controls.desc: Multi-factor authentication (MFA) adds an extra layer of protection.

results.code_desc: IAM user john.doe should have MFA enabled
results.message: User has console access but MFA is not enabled
